original_text: Then everyone who respected the words of Israel's God came around me. They were afraid of what God might do, because the Israelites who came from Babylon had not obeyed him. I continued to sit there, until the time of the evening sacrifice. I was still very upset.
korean_text: 이에 이스라엘의 하나님의 말씀으로 말미암아 떠는 자가 사로잡혔던 이 사람들의 죄 때문에 다 내게로 모여오더라 내가 저녁 제사 드릴 때까지 기가 막혀 앉았더니

sentences.original_text: Then everyone who respected the words of Israel's God
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 이스라엘의 하나님의 말씀을 존중하는 모든 사람들이

sentences.original_text: They were afraid of what God might do,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님이 하실지 모르는 일을 두려워했다,

sentences.original_text: because the Israelites who came from Babylon
until the time of the evening sacrifice.
